article_title: Two injured in Harnett County shooting
article_text:
You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters

Message: * A friend wanted you to see this item from WRAL.com: http://wral.com/15487247

— Two people were shot Sunday morning near Fuquay-Varina in Harnett County, authorities said.

Authorities were called at 525 Caley Dr. where Herman Douglas, 21, of 525 Caley Dr. and Terry McLean, 20 of 1012 Phelps West Rd., were found with gunshot wounds.

Both Douglas and McLean were taken to WakeMed for treatment. Their conditions were not released.

Authorities are looking for a tan or brown Chevrolet Malibu in connection with the shooting.

No arrests have been made.

No additional information was immediately available.
